item.description:
A Night Of Sinatra- with charasmatic singer & KISS 108 Personality- Rich Demare

 

****SINATRA inspired cocktail specials- The Perfect Jack Manhattan

                                                         The Big Appletini & more........

 

 

Reinvent your Thursdays with cool jazz and hot bites from 6pm-9pm.

Trendy appetizers, funky cocktails, smooth jazz and mingling await the discerning diner and fun-seeker every Thursday night. Chef Scott features five delectable bar bites each week, great for sharing and sampling a variety of tastes.

* 5 Delectable Bar Bites:  $5 each.

*Specialty Drinks:  $8.00 

Try Thursdays at Seaglass and live a little! Available at the bar and in the lounge.
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a meetup sign on our table(s)
item.name: Music, Martinis, Manhattans, & More- A Night Of Sinatra
